title: MicroStrategy thrives on Bitcoin strategy while Tesla left over $1 billion on table as stock slips
description:

title: El Salvador celebrates first Bitcoin diploma graduates
description: El Salvador marked a historic event on April 2nd, 2024 when the country honored a graduating class in the “Bitcoin diploma” program. The 2022 initiative, organized by the non-profit organization Mi Primer Bitcoin, seeks to instill Salvadorans with vital understanding and practical skills in Bitcoin. title: Do Kwon’s South Korean extradition annulled by Montenegro Supreme Court
description: Another twist in the extradition saga of Terraform Labs founder Do Kwon revealed that the forgery convict will not return to his native South Korea just yet.
